_header: Saint John witness til us alway
Note: For the usual version see 4636 and 4644.
_description: Gospel for the Fourth Sunday in Lent in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint Iohn witnes till vs alwayIn þe godspell of þis day…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Gladly to do almus dedeAnd to help þam þat here has nede
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Abiit ihesu crist transmare galile.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica quarta quadragesime Secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 53rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.93-97.
